Author: sodiddlydone
Text: wow its like reading about my own situation

Author: bruno_guy
Text: i'm sorry you have to feel this way, i can relate to you when I'm struggling a lot and i want someone to just help me or see that i'm hurting but its like they don't notice and i think do i need to lose more weight or stop eating for them to see that i'm hurting and I want to be saved in a way. but its bull shit that people ownly speak up to you when you're looking "unhealthy" and shit like that my mom didn't speak up in till i went to the doctor and lost 22 pounds in just one month, and she was like "why are you not eating anymore and why did you lose so much weight so fast" (because everytime i go to the doctors each month i lost weight, it started with 10-20 now its like 4-8 pounds).
